item.title: A Note on Sankrit : Root of 'Daughter', Idea of Devata
item.description: Daughter The theory goes like that English ‘daughter’, German ‘Tochter’, Greek ‘thygater’, Irish ‘dear’, Lithuanian ‘dukte’, Russian ‘doch’, …
